| HistoryText             = The Black Knights were the elite soldiers of the [[Universal Church of Truth (Earth-616)|Universal Church of Truth]], an order of religious zealots who worshipped the entity known as the [[Magus (Earth-7528)|Magus]]. They clashed repeatedly with [[Adam Warlock (Earth-616)|Adam Warlock]],{{r|Strange Tales Vol 1 179|181}}{{r|Warlock Vol 1 9|11}} and later with [[Peter Quill (Earth-616)|Star Lord]]'s [[Guardians of the Galaxy (Earth-616)|Guardians of the Galaxy]].{{r|Guardians of the Galaxy Vol 2 24}}

More recently, they infiltrated Earth, setting up a base in [[Colorado (State)|Colorado]]. They were challenged by the [[Annihilators (Earth-616)|Annihilators]].{{r|Annihilators: Earthfall Vol 1 1|4}} They were formerly led by [[Autolycus (Sark) (Earth-616)|Autolycus]] until his soul was swallowed by the [[Soul Stone|Soul Gem]].{{r|Strange Tales Vol 1 179}}
